p: The leaves of X. strumarium were collected in the flowering stage in March 2017 from El-Salhia region, Al-Sharkia Province, Egypt (30°38′59″N 31°57′53″E). The collected plant was identified by one from the author, Associate Professor Ahmed M. Abd El-Gawad. A voucher specimen (Mans.001024019) was deposited in the herbarium of Botany Department Faculty of Science, Mansoura University, Egypt.
